playn.core.gl

Interface GLProgram

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GL20Program

    public interface GLProgram
    Provides the GL methods and buffer management needed to implement a GL shader.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind()
      Binds this shader program, in preparation for rendering.
      void destroy()
      Frees this program and associated compiled shaders.
      GLShader.Attrib getAttrib(String name, int size, int type)
      Returns a handle on the attribute with the specified name.
      GLShader.Uniform1f getUniform1f(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.
      GLShader.Uniform1i getUniform1i(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.
      GLShader.Uniform2f getUniform2f(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.
      GLShader.Uniform2fv getUniform2fv(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.
      GLShader.Uniform2i getUniform2i(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.
      GLShader.Uniform3f getUniform3f(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.
      GLShader.Uniform4f getUniform4f(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.
      GLShader.Uniform4fv getUniform4fv(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.
      GLShader.UniformMatrix4fv getUniformMatrix4fv(String name)
      Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name.

    • Method Detail

      • getUniform1f

        GLShader.Uniform1f getUniform1f(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getUniform2f

        GLShader.Uniform2f getUniform2f(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getUniform3f

        GLShader.Uniform3f getUniform3f(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getUniform4f

        GLShader.Uniform4f getUniform4f(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getUniform1i

        GLShader.Uniform1i getUniform1i(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getUniform2i

        GLShader.Uniform2i getUniform2i(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getUniform2fv

        GLShader.Uniform2fv getUniform2fv(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getUniform4fv

        GLShader.Uniform4fv getUniform4fv(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getUniformMatrix4fv

        GLShader.UniformMatrix4fv getUniformMatrix4fv(String name)
        Returns a handle on the uniform with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no uniform with that name.

      • getAttrib

        GLShader.Attrib getAttrib(String name,
                        int size,
                        int type)
        Returns a handle on the attribute with the specified name. Returns null if the program contains no attribute with that name.

      • bind

        void bind()
        Binds this shader program, in preparation for rendering.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Frees this program and associated compiled shaders. The program must not be used after destruction.
